description:
Taking an idea from a fairy tale, Keroro thinks it would be a good idea to manipulate Natsumi to fall in love with Giroro and then start to like Keroro better.  Needless to say, the operation does not go so smoothly.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Giroro Nakenai Akaoni de Arimasu / Giroro Tobidase Setsubun! de Arimasu
Une histoire diabolique / Giroro et la fête du printemps
ギロロ 泣けない赤鬼 であります / ギロロ 飛び出せ節分! であります
